cause.description:
The Sikh Coalition is a community-based organization that works towards the realization of civil and human rights for all people. In particular, we work towards a world where Sikhs may freely practice and enjoy their faith while fostering strong relations with their local community wherever they may be.
1. Providing direct legal services to persons whose civil or human rights are violated
2. Advocating for law and policies that are respectful of fundamental rights
3. Promoting appreciation for diversity through education
4. Fostering civic engagement in order to promote local community empowerment
cause.mission: defend civil rights of Sikhs, educate society about the Sikh faith and promote civic engagement within the sikh community.
cause.name: Sikh Coalition
